headline: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis reaches disgraceful new low in bullying Special Olympics | Opinion
author: Mike Freeman
sentences: We saw a good example of this in 2019, when the Trump administration, in a remarkably cold move, attempted to kill federal funding for the Special Olympics.
One of the hallmarks of a bully, of a cruel human being, is attacking people who don't always have the political power or resources to defend themselves.
Ron DeSantis has previously appealed to racists and other Cro-Magnon types.
His actions against Special Olympics appeal to anti-vaxxers.
